FindSideLengthsAndAreasOfSquares.description: Find the side lengths and areas of squares
FindSideLengthsAndAreasOfSquares.template: Look at the table I have attached. In the first row are some side lengths of squares. In the second row is the area of the same square. Can you fill in the missing values in both rows? For example, if a square has an area of 9 square units, what is the side length?
